data.name: The Silence Of Darkness
data.detailed_description:
My name is Mihai Darius (Midsoft, Inc.) and I am a game developer. I work alone, so I make my own games. This is a horror game and it's still WIP (Work-in-Progress). I will make a lot of updates and you will be notified when I finish them. Please, send me an e-mail with the request of an update and some details. I will do my best. I will make updates weekly. It is still Work-In-Progress and there is only 1 map. It is not shown in the video. It is a surprise. It is a forest. Expect bugs, lag, glitches. I will make a lot of updates.

Features:

Advanced Zombie AI;
Binoculars;
FPS Counter;
True FPS (Full Body|NOT FPS arms);
High quality sound effects;
More than 60 frames per second (FPS);
Smooth movement.
Light flicker;
Scary sound effects;
Main Menu;
Fullscreen option;
Flashlight.

1 Map:

"The Forest"

The Silence Of Darkness is a single-player WiP horror game.
There are zombies that will chase, attack and kill you. You have to defend yourself.
They will see and hear you even if you are behind them. RUN, but....you will get tired...
If they touch the fire, they will die...
You have only ONE option...SURVIVE!
